0001111110010000 0110001010000110 1 -> sum: 1000001000010111, cout: 0
0010010100000010 0100011110111010 0 -> sum: 0110110010111100, cout: 0
1001101011101111 1010110101110011 0 -> sum: 0100100001100010, cout: 1
0110100010010011 0010101011100100 1 -> sum: 1001001101111000, cout: 0
0010011111111110 1001010000001100 1 -> sum: 1011110000001011, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
